title: Bloomberg Markets: Cohodes Says Home Capital Is `Sick' Company
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Cohodes Says Home Capital Is `Sick' Company
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Marc Cohodes Private Investor Katia Dmitrieva Real Estate Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Warren Buffett agreeing to buy shares of Canadian mortgage company Home Capital Group . Cohodes began shorting the stock when it was at C$53 a share; since then, it has dropped about 75 percent. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
